Class EntityLOD

extends Entity
    Implementation of Level of Detail.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      TexturedModel getModelBasedOnDistance​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f cameraPosition)
      returns the correct LOD based on distance from camera, if the object is too far (distance > visibilityDistance), returns null

    • Constructor Detail

      • EntityLOD

        public EntityLOD​(java.util.List<TexturedModel> models,
                 org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position,
                 float rotX,
                 float rotY,
                 float rotZ,
                 float scale,
                 float visibilityDistance,
                 java.util.List<java.lang.Float> distances)
        Init the entity using LODs
        Parameters:
        models - an array of models from the most simple to most detailed
        position - position in the scene
        rotX - x rotation
        rotY - y rotation
        rotZ - z rotation
        scale - uniform scale of the model
        visibilityDistance - maximum viewing distance for all the models
        distances - for N models N-1 distances (0 - 1) dividing the visibility distance to parts occupied by the LODs

    • Method Detail

      • getModelBasedOnDistance

        public TexturedModel getModelBasedOnDistance​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f cameraPosition)
        returns the correct LOD based on distance from camera, if the object is too far (distance > visibilityDistance), returns null
        Overrides:
        getModelBasedOnDistance in class Entity
        Parameters:
        cameraPosition - current camera position
        Returns:
        model to render
